snippet.title: OPUS: Rocket of Whispers - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
OPUS: Rocket of Whispers is now on Steam & Android & iOS!
Steam:http://store.steampowered.com/app/742250/OPUS_Rocket_of_Whispers/
Android:https://goo.gl/4FuPCG 
iOS:https://goo.gl/wudkkA 

====STORY====
OPUS: Rocket of Whispers takes place in a post-apocalyptic world, and tells the story of John, the son of a rocket engineer, and Fei, a witch who awoke from twenty years of cryogenic sleep. 

Together, they must collect what little material they can find to build a rocket, and launch a space burial to return the lost souls of their desolate world to their final resting place. 

====GAMEPLAY====
Throughout the game, players will explore and scavenge the snowy wasteland of OPUS through a top-down perspective, and must overcome the treacherous weather and terrain. 

As they gather materials for the rocket, the story behind the demise of their world will slowly unfold through the ruins and artifacts they find.
